title: nAmam OdinAl
sahitya:
nAmam OdinAl kSEmam uralAmE nEmamAga nidam svAminAthan divya


anupallavi

  kAma krOdha vAsanaigaLaiyum AshaiyODu O manamE nI oru muraiyEnum


caraNam    nAvinikka adai Odum yAvarkkumE eppOdum tIvinai yAvumE tIravE tuNaiyAgum
bhAva vimOcanam Avadarkku udavum parama sukha vAsap-perum pEraLikkum
